title: Beyond Training: Why Test-Time Compute is Reshaping AI Performance
excerpt: Explore Test-Time Compute (TTC), the crucial-yet-often-overlooked computational cost of running AI models *after* training. Discover why TTC is a bottleneck for modern AI, its impact on user experience and cost, and how techniques like 'slow thinking' and Meta Reinforcement Fine-Tuning are unlocking new levels of AI reasoning.

title: Boost Your VS Code Workflow: Using Google Gemini with the 'cline' Extension
excerpt: Bring the power of Google Gemini's AI coding assistance directly into your VS Code editor with the 'cline' extension. Streamline your development process and get context-aware help without leaving your IDE.

title: Building Step-by-Step AI Workflows with Google ADK's SequentialAgent
excerpt: Explore how Google's Agent Development Kit (ADK) simplifies multi-agent system creation, focusing on the SequentialAgent – a powerful tool for building structured, step-by-step AI workflows by orchestrating tasks in a defined sequence.

title: Top Container Images Every .NET, ReactJS, and Generative AI Developer Must Have
excerpt: Discover the essential container images for .NET, ReactJS, and Generative AI developers to streamline your development workflow and enhance productivity.

title: Deep Dive into LLMs like ChatGPT – A Detailed Summary

title: South Korea's DeepSeek Faces Competition from China's AI Giants
excerpt: South Korea's leading AI company, DeepSeek, is encountering increasing competition from China's rapidly advancing AI sector.

title: Microsoft’s .NET 10 Arrives in First Preview
excerpt: .NET 10 introduces C# 14 and adds major enhancements to the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, and .NET MAUI, aiming for a production release in November.

title: .NET 9 Release: What's New and Improved

title: Top Common Pitfalls in .NET Development and How to Avoid Them

title: The Evolution and Maturation of Large Language Models
